channel.title: Help adding a timer (639)
channel.description: Hey I need to add a trade timer to my trading system. I want it so after someone trades they have to wait 60 seconds to log out, Because it's really the only dupe left in my server. And It needs to be fixed.

item.title: Help adding a timer (639)
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

I could add on normal pi

  1. Add a new delay (logoutDelay)
  2. In trade method when you trade make reset timer
  3. In logout method put if (“logoutDelay =< 30000”)
    at the end
    } else {
    SendMessage(“you need to wait 30 seconds after trading”)

Hope this helped in anyway you mite be able to translate code

Read full topic
